about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer with a focus on creating exceptional digital experiences
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer with expertise in React, React Native, and Web 3.0 technologies. With over 3 years of freelance experience, I've successfully delivered more than 12 projects across diverse domains including web applications, decentralized apps (dApps), blockchain-based marketplaces, and interactive games.
about.paragraph2: My journey in technology started with a solid foundation in Computing and Web Development, where I earned a Second Class Honours (Upper Division) degree. I've worked on everything from full-stack web applications to cutting-edge blockchain solutions, always focusing on delivering high-quality, user-centered experiences.
about.paragraph3: Currently working as a Mid-Senior Frontend Developer at Aceve and Hexa Consulting, I specialize in React.js and React Native development. I'm based in Seixal, Setúbal, Portugal, and I'm always excited to take on new challenges and contribute to innovative projects.
